profileAlternative.name: Kirupa Chinnathambi üçä
profileAlternative.headline: Professional Pixel Pusher
profileAlternative.summary:
By day, I am a seasoned PM with a knack for getting to the root of a complex situation and finding a path forward (usually involves shipping code!) that makes customers happy.

By night, I run KIRUPA - one of the world's largest (and popular) free educational resources for demystifying web development. The online community has over 210K registered members, millions of posts, thousands of high quality articles, hundreds of popular videos, and more!

With my remaining time, I am a best-selling author of several technical books and a frequent presenter at popular conferences.

aboutAlternative.text:
By day, I am a seasoned PM with a knack for getting to the root of a complex situation and finding a path forward (usually involves shipping code!) that makes customers happy.

By night, I run KIRUPA - one of the world's largest (and popular) free educational resources for demystifying web development. The online community has over 210K registered members, millions of posts, thousands of high quality articles, hundreds of popular videos, and more!

With my remaining time, I am a best-selling author of several technical books and a frequent presenter at popular conferences.

positions.title: Senior Director of Product Management
positions.description: Helping push the limits of what one can do using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as part of the Lightning Design System team.

positions.title: CEO / Founder / Ninja
positions.description:
What was a hobby turned into something that has helped a boatload of designers and developers learn programming. If you are a front-end developer, there is probably an article, video, or forum topic (2 million posts, 200k members) that can help you out!

https://www.kirupa.com
‚Ä¶
see more

positions.title: Senior Technical PM
positions.description: As part of the Developer Division and Windows teams, designed and delivered features across multiple versions of Expression Blend, Visual Studio IDE, and the Windows Web Platform (aka the components that Edge is built on top of).

educations.title: Massachusetts Institute of Technology
educations.fieldofstudy: Computer Science with a dash of Economics and History

items: Animation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Senior Director of Product Management at Salesforce
Founding member on new Microsoft Managed Security team at Microsoft
The Modern, open Microsoft Edge browser. #shipeveryday #wearenotdone
